body_html: @cpuhrsch I compiled from source with DEBUG=1 the test passes. I even set OMP_NUM_THREADS=32 and test still passes. I'm wondering if it has something to do with using -O3. Where can I set the CXXFLAG to -O2 only for the TBB component (i.e. I want to leave the rest at -O3)
